storyInfo:
In Wei Yenwu's office, discussions about the situation boil over into disputes.
Questions. Doubt. Blame. Disappointment. Persistance. Sighs. In the end, Ch'en chooses to fight alone.

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu's Office - 6:30 P.M.
Correct, Mr. Wei. Thirty-two hours from now, the core city will collide with Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Its urban identification code has not been changed, which means that the core of Chernobog, this nomadic city, is still Ursus territory.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So attacking it would be an act of war...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Reunion holding Ursus hostage like this is the height of absurdity.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You're unreasonably calm, Mr. Wei. Did it maybe occur to you what a peace-loving country the Empire is?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ursus expansionism is driven by a lust for wealth, territory, and growth.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If it was profitable, the Empire would start a world war without a second thought. And they would've done it decades ago.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But to provoke a war with Yan?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The fact that Yan has not waged war for centuries does not mean they lack the capacity to fight. But I'd say a militaristic state might struggle to understand what it is that's led to Yan's prosperity.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A world war would leave both sides devastated. Yan would need a long time to recover, but Ursus, with its myriad internal conflicts, would take it even harder.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ursus is no longer the world-devouring beast it once was. Only fools and madmen would wage a war that is costly, unprofitable, and doomed to fail.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, as far as I know, fools and madmen are a dime a dozen in the nomadic cities of the world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Weeding out such people is one of my most important duties. And it's a function of the State Council of Ursus.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Once the State Council responds, we'll implement measures to put a stop to the Chernobog core.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The diplomats will handle the rest.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Our only responsibility is to take control of this crisis before it gets out of hand.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You have that much faith in the Empire?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No. I have faith in mutual interest.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Fighting war after war teaches bitter lessons. And even though Ursus has won a lot of riches from its wars, it has been unable to fight the internal rot those wars have bred...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It has not been able to integrate the peoples and lands it has conquered. And no nation can handle a rebellion while choking down the poison brewed by the mutual crisscrossing hate of its own populace.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The Empire of Ursus is a rotting corpse posturing to look strong.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And that is why you believe Ursus will act in its own interests and abide by their deal with you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have no deal with the Chairman of the State Council, verbal or otherwise. But the two of us have about the same amount of sanity left.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Fumizuki, send the message for me. I have to make use of this time...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Um.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: ...Fumizuki?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There is another message here. For you.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, Amiya, Ch'en... you should hear this too.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fumizuki?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You will change your mind when you hear this.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If you reject their help again, we'll truly be isolated.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: 'Chief Wei, you must act immediately upon receiving this message.'
attributes.name: Recording

attributes.content: What...? That's my Messenger.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: 'The following has been Arts encrypted.'
attributes.name: Recording

attributes.content: 'Mr. Wei, Groups Three and Four are standing down. We are unable to get to the source of the matter.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'I can't even speculate on who the mastermind might be.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'They were whispering from the parliamentary gallery, laughing at my miserable, helpless performance. But I found no evidence to hold them accountable.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'If something happens in Chernobog, you must do everything you can to stop it. Otherwise, who knows what will happen?'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'You have the wisdom and ability to stop it at its source. What we could not do, you must do in our stead.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: That's the end.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: ...I want to hear the rest.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The rest is the Messenger's soliloquy.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: He's my Messenger. Let me hear it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: 'I was unable to meet Chairman Witte, and the Messenger he sent to liaise with me was waylaid by unknown forces. Fortunately, that Messenger is still safe and sound.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'The Messenger slipped out of Deity Grypherburg in the dead of night, and someone secretly aided him. I believe there are forces within Ursus vying for supremacy.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'I was attacked many times on the road after that. And there were many others who tried to protect me.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Witte tried to help them...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: 'I reached the Ural Rift and commandeered a messaging station. What happens now, even I don't know.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: 'I hope to make it back to Lungmen, to enjoy the flavors of home once again.'
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: How is he now?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Unclear if he's alive or dead.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: It sounds like the Chairman of the State Council plans to stand by and see how this plays out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The State Council is at the heart of the Empire... But Chernobog is out on the periphery now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The borderlands mostly belong to the Army, and some remnants of the ancient nobility.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Army hasn't had a chance to engage in such operations since the Great Rebellion, but the Infected did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The ancient nobility, closely watched as they were, couldn't have planned the Chernobog incident, but the Infected could.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Indeed, most of Reunion's Infected had no training, they didn't stand a chance against the Ursus Guard and the Chernobog riot police—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But a Catastrophe did. Chernobog failed to split the plates in time, and there was nothing they could do against a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Reunion had to infiltrate the city early to stop the security forces from mobilizing, while the Army ignored their maneuvering.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lungmen and Rhodes Island anticipated Reunion's actions, and the L.G.D. made a plan to annihilate them, but Chernobog...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even to this day, Chernobog, and the Ursus Court... haven't said a word.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now we know why.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Writing off the city and all its inhabitants, Ursus handed Chernobog over to Reunion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And the Infected, who have lived so long on the threshold of death that they no longer fear it, would assume control of the city after the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They didn't have to do anything. They just... got out of the way.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: They only had to let it happen.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: But after suffering a Catastrophe, Chernobog was just a dead city with nothing of value...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Which left the Infected heading for Lungmen! No matter who's running Reunion, this... all the elements were perfectly aligned...!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Give the order. The censors must stand down, use force if necessary. We will prepare for war. We must be absolutely certain we can disable that core before it's too late.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And no one is to know of this until the Chernobog core is stopped.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mr. Wei?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're going to start the war yourself?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fumizuki, you've seen all Lungmen has been through, you must know. My brother wouldn't stand for me starting a war with Ursus.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...I must take the initiative, we must take control of the situation, even if it costs all of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Starting a war means being seen as an aggressor. It makes it more difficult to forge alliances.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The first one to enter a state of war is likely to find itself isolated.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But... the worst part is, no one can know the truth until after the war is over, whatever it might be...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Some countries don't even care about the truth. All they want is an excuse.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But, Mr. Wei, I believe we can achieve peace through diplomatic means.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you for the suggestion, Madam Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But I'm afraid Witte and I are the last hope for peace between our two countries.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Whether our enemy is the Empire's Third Army or the Emperor of Ursus, this war is going to happen eventually, even if we are certain to win it. Peace is no longer possible.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If Witte is too meek to use official channels to put a stop to this, it means he'll face too much resistance and criticism for it, even if it works. He's a politician. He has to look out for himself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Having pushed him this far, the Empire's bureaucracy may be in some state of semi-paralysis.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A couple of divisions can hold Ursus hostage, but not Lungmen. This is not Ursus, you're entitled to an emergency response to another moving city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wouldn't it then be too late to separate the city?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the core is not stopped, the collision will destroy Lungmen. And the conflict that follows will cause further, unfathomable disaster.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But to stop the core...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Firing our guns or sending a spec ops team would indeed mean a declaration of war on Ursus.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Anything Witte might have been able to stop has been cut completely loose by the Chernobog core.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: An isolated city, cut off from all communication, left with nothing but identification codes, needs very little explanation.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: As you say, Doctor. It's up to Lungmen now. Only we can stop the Chernobog core.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Think carefully, Mr. Wei. There are serious consequences to an act of war.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: War is serious business, but the other choice, as far as Lungmen is concerned, would be far worse.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mr. Wei. Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll go.
Huh... Miss Ch'en?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ch'en?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're a Lungmenite.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I can leave Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, don't play the hero. This isn't your responsibility.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If Lungmen needs a traitor, let it be me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm sick of you, Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You and your precious city.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I stopped being a Lungmenite even before you dug your claws into the slums.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Now is not the time for a debate on ethics.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What did they do? Why did you have to do that to them?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'What did they do?'
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Tell me, Miss Chen, what did they do?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Tell me, where was it Reunion hid themselves? Where was it they snuck into our city?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You trust the slum dwellers, but do they trust you? Where did that trust come from?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Have any of them, aside from your informants or Lin Kojui's ears, reported the Infected infiltrating their homes?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Things happened so fast! That doesn't mean anything!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Did you receive even a single tip?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes or no?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Not one. Not a single person stepped up.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: They don't trust you. They would rather put their faith in foreign provocateurs than the Rat King or the Superintendent of the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Maybe Reunion was threatening them. Reunion's Infected are known to be violent and dangerous.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Did they forget that Lungmen has never raised a hand against them?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I don't blame them for supporting each other.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: In fact, if the Infected didn't support each other, if they hated each other instead, the slums would have long since destroyed themselves.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But they could have opposed Reunion. They could have come together with the Rat King's people to fight the infiltrators, they could have asked for your help——
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: They don't trust——
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Exactly. They don't trust you. After all you've done for them. They still don't trust you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We should have sent the L.G.D. into the slums long ago!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It was the locals who didn't want the L.G.D. in the slums. They were the ones working against my L.G.D. time and time again.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Even as Lin Kojui and I worked so hard to root out the criminals and foreign agents from the slums, it was those same locals who scoffed at the sacrifices of our soldiers.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Was it Lungmen that rejected them?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Answer me, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Look me in the eyes and answer me!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's not their fault.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then whose, pray tell, is it?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: How many times have I told you? You have the right to your own thoughts and opinions... provided you don't let them affect your work.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The L.G.D. is here to protect Lungmen. The Special Inspection Unit is here to guide the L.G.D. to protect Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The slums you've done so much for have become a vulnerability that could lead to Lungmen's destruction.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Reunion exploited the Infected among them to distract us, letting our guard down to Chernobog.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The measures we took to fight off Reunion left us open to this maneuver by the core city.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And those Infected stood by and did nothing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If Lungmen falls here, it is ultimately by their hand.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Who should be held responsible for turning Lungmen into a flashpoint? Who is responsible for lives lost and blood spilled?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So much destruction over a few neighborhoods... just because we didn't act in time.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: When you say 'act,' do you mean——
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Whose fault is it?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Was it Lungmen that rejected them? No.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It was they who rejected Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So you'll dispose of them?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Indifference and a lack of vision already destroyed them. I have no reason to care for these people anymore.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ch'en. We are all tainted with our innumerable mistakes.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Everyone makes mistakes. All we can do is fix them, or cover them up for a while.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There is always someone who can do what I can't. But for now, I still have things to do.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Everyone makes mistakes?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know what you're saying.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The Infected are a mistake, as long as they exist in the city?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Pigheaded girl.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, I have told you everything. Now do what you must.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Alright then. *Inhales*...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu, what I must do, what the L.G.D. must do, is name who is at fault, and correct the mistake.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It seems that, according to your definition, I am at fault.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We could also say I am the mistake.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Because I am Infected.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ch'en?!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is no need to hide it anymore.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: For three years, you've been hiding my infection from the world. Now that the Infected have no place in this city, neither do I.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nonsense!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: She and I are both Infected. I don't belong here. I know what I must do, and I won't be making any more mistakes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm the only one who can stop her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Don't feel bad. I understand. We're sworn brothers, aren't we? Brothers... remember where we came from.'
Sworn brothers ruined.
I am Infected, and a traitor to Lungmen. I am the only one who can do this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'I hate you. And I hate them. I should love you, but right now I hate every last one of you.'
Blood relations ruined.
We've come this far. All we can do is keep going.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Why me? Why does it have to be me? Who could feel safe sitting here?'
Close family ruined.
No.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If you leave this office today, Ch'en Hui-chieh... you will be an enemy of Lungmen. You will never again be allowed to set foot in this city.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And all that we've worked for together for the past ten years... will come to nothing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Everything I worked for came to nothing as soon as you did what you did.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lungmen is about to go up in flames. A battle is upon us. You have your ways, I have mine.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The only difference is, I'm not like you. I don't think anyone is a 'mistake.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I won't let this city fall. But I won't go in without a plan either.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Power is a tool, at the end of the day. If you are going to use this tool to tinker with the world, you have to conform to its expectations.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Um.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't make a mockery of yourself, Inspector Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Laugh at that, and you're laughing at yourself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I raised you to change it. I hoped that you would change this world to want more than prosperity and growth.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So, has it changed? Can it be changed? Does everything I've worked for actually mean anything?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Even if it can't now, it must be someday.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You're going to make sure it can be changed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Wait! Stop! Who are you?!
attributes.name: Receptionist

attributes.content: You can't go in there... security?! Where are the guards?! There's an intruder!
attributes.name: Receptionist

attributes.content: Lord Wei, we will act.
Get out.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Let us act!
You shouldn't have come.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Heh... haha, ahahahaha...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu, that's all it took to show your true colors? Your private army just shows up here in your office?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, Lungmen is threatened!
Sounds like you have a strong sense of duty.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I don't believe a word you say. If you have something for him, go ahead.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lord Wei... it is within our means to infiltrate the city, kill the mastermind, and stop the collision! We shall sacrifice our lives for the city, and lift this burden from thy shoulders!
Get out!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Lord Wei!
How about it, Wei Yenwu? Will you send them, or send me? Is that a tough choice?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Why is it you're so decisive when it comes to killing people and so indecisive when it's time to save them?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's how it is now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's how it was then.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I didn't expect a chance at a proper goodbye.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've thought about it many times, Wei Yenwu, but I never expected to give anyone a proper goodbye.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Miss Fumizuki, I'm sorry my mom treated you like that. Thank you for looking after me all these years. I've always thought of you as family.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Ch'en?!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Not anymore. This badge? You can have it back.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Seize her!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You want to fight here first? To decide who's the real traitor?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, the enemy is at our gates!
I'm Infected. I'm your greatest enemy.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Cease and desist! Or I will show no mercy!
Who have you ever shown mercy?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't sound all high-and-mighty about things you can't do!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lord Wei, look out!
Chi Xiao - Rouse Qi!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Brother, if this sword is used to slay dragons, does it also work on Dracos?'
'It just might. Looks like I'll have to be more careful around you, haha...'
Her Arts... are overflowing?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, get behind me! I'll block the Arts!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No... It'll just get torn apart by that kind of power.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She's not aiming for us. Get out of her range right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah, okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Her Arts are beginning to expand. Back up!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ——Release!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The dragonslaying sword... unsheathed?!
Tsk...!
You can block it with just your wrist?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Most astute! I see your swordsmanship is sharper than ever, Superintendent!
...Tempered Originium. Chi Xiao, huh? To think that they're still making weapons like that...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, is that sword specifically forged to fight against energy-based Arts?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...At first, Madam Ch'en didn't even let me look at that sword. Was she envisioning a situation where I would be an enemy...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lord Wei, the Superintendent has chosen her path. I may not be able to block a second blow. Shall I put my life on the line?
Through my death, I assure you that Inspector Ch'en will remain in Lungmen. Though I cannot guarantee that she'll have her limbs intact, I can ensure that she lives.
—Impermissible. You, fall back. Don't engage her directly!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I shall immediately alert my brothers.
Planning to call reinforcements? Chi Xiao—!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Cease!!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Gah..!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hui-chieh, are you going to use the cloud-splitting sword?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Don't forget, who taught you your swordsmanship and your Arts?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I never once thought to strip you of your swordsmanship, but I will no longer play nice at this point.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Don't force my hand, Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Do it then, Master Wei. Chi Xiao answers to me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The day you gave me Chi Xiao, did you think I would slay you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I won't use it to spill your blood, Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You think you're protecting me, right?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: My mother died to depression. Talulah was taken away. I contracted Oripathy in the course of my work.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You think everything you've done was for the sake of protecting me, don't you? Is that because of your guilty conscience, or because of your confidence in your own strategies?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't want to witness another tragedy ever again.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Liar!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu, there are those who this sword seeks to kill... and those who it seeks to protect.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If she truly wishes to destroy Lungmen...!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No... No. You must not go.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I never thought I would beat you and your Black Cloaks here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...But there is more than one way out of here, Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The window?!
Ch'en Hui-chieh! Stop this foolishness! We're hundreds of meters above the ground.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: This wouldn't be the first time I've used the window route. Or the second.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en Hui-chieh, you must not go to her!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ahhh... Ch'en...!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You mustn't repeat the same mistakes! You can't go down the same path we did!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If there's anyone who should die for this city, that person should be—
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: *Sigh.*
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Uncle...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No... Wei Yenwu. Starting today, we are strangers.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The sound of glass smashing echoed across the room, and Ch'en falls face-up from the tall building.
The lord of Lungmen let out a thunderous roar, and the man in the black poncho leapt toward the window like an arrow springing from a bowstring.
But Ch'en had already made up her mind.
